item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1194; 06:14PM; 823 N Orange Grove Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3sBrroD; Fairfax; KNOCKDOWN: 19 firefighters located a contents fire in the unit and extinguished it in 21 minutes with no injuries reported. No other units were damaged. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC5 E227 E261 E41 RA41 T27 T61; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1194; 05:53PM; 823 N Orange Grove Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3sBrroD; Fairfax; Two story duplex with fire in one unit (initial reports of fire on the 2nd floor but possibly extending to the 1st). Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC5 E227 E261 E41 T27 T61; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0576; 10:43AM; 426 N Neptune Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JlH3CC; Wilmington; KNOCKDOWN: 32 firefighters extinguished the fire in 17 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire partially extended into the attic but was prevented from damaging an exposed storage shed. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 E238 E248 E264 E40 E48 E64 T38 T48 T64; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Automobile Fire; INC#0548; 10:39AM; 500 N Quay Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FxdATY; Wilmington; Firefighters have bulk of the fire extinguished and will continue to overhaul the vehicles. Cause and $ loss TBD. No injuries reported and no structures damaged. No further details.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E248 E38 E48 E49 RA101 T48; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0576; 10:26AM; 426 N Neptune Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JlH3CC; Wilmington; Detached garage (behind a one story, single family dwelling) well involved in fire. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 E238 E264 E40 E64 T38 T64 T48 E248; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Automobile Fire; INC#0548; 10:12AM; 500 N Quay Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FxdATY; Wilmington; 3 big rigs are well involved in fire within an auto yard. No structures are threatened at this time. No additional resources are anticipated to be needed. Firefighters are making an offensive fire attack and working to prevent exposure to any additional vehicles. No injuries reported.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E248 E38 E48 E49 T48 RA101; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1220; 07:16PM; 1958 W Florence Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JkDlsW; Manchester Square; KNOCKDOWN: Firefighters faced forcible entry challenges gaining access inside the structure, which prompted a request for additional resources. Once they made entry, they were able to quickly locate the seat of the fire and 31 firefighters extinguished the fire in 18 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was prevented from extending into the attic of the stand alone building. The restaurant was closed at the time and the cause/$ loss is TBD. No further details.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 E266 E294 E33 E46 E94 RA246 T66 T94; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1220; 06:52PM; 1958 W Florence Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JkDlsW; Manchester Square; One story, 50' x 50' commercial building (DBA Woody BBQ) with fire showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 E266 E33 E94 T66; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0536; 10:16AM; 1442 N Formosa Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pu6cU5; Hollywood; The first arriving fire companies quickly extinguished fire in one unit on the first floor of a two story, 8-plex apartment building with fire in one unit on the first floor. Firefighters contained it to the unit of origin, preventing any extensive to above or adjacent units. Despite initial reports of someone in the unit, both the primary and secondary search found no occupants. There are no injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. The original 9-1-1 call was received at 10:02AM. No further details.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E227 E261 E82 RA82 RA827 T27 T61; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0331; 06:54AM; 254 W Gage Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3H6d67G; Florence; KNOCKDOWN: 23 firefighters extinguished the fire in 12 minutes with no injuries reported. No other structures were damaged. No further details.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E233 E266 E57 RA257 RA833 SQ21 T33 T66; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart
